item.description:
Kimball Farm in Westford hosts Cruise Night, with as many as 350 cars ranging from Corvettes to Model A's. The now famous "Ultimate Cruise Night" offers the additional excitement of live local band entertainment and delicious Kimball Farm BBQ grill. Try to resist the Legendary Ice Cream Buffet. What better way is there to spend a Summer evening. Admission for the general public is $3.00 for adults and children under 12 are free. Car exhibitors & their passengers enter at no charge.
http://www.kimballfar...
If rain cancels this event we will make it the following Thursday, June 14th. The event actually runs from 6-9 if you want to get there earlier. We will set a location to meet as the date nears. Kimball's also has mini golf, pitch and putt, bumper boats and a country store, so bring friends and enjoy. :-)

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Cruise Night at Kimball's
